flawed_nl_solution:
Before dinner, she had 56+8=<<56+8=65>>65 ounces of CM.
Before drinking 8 ounces of CM during lunch, she had 65+8=<<65+8=73>>73 ounces of CM.
Before buying 64 ounces of CM, she had 73-64=<<73-64=9>>9 ounces of CM.
And before breakfast, she had 9+8=<<9+8=17>>17 ounces of chocolate milk.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 64, not 65. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
